column5: Got out today for two hours..decided to go without roe and force myself to get confident with jigs...  Three minutes after arriving this HOG was on the line    Landed one more after that and lost 2 due to crappy hooksets.  Good day, see ya out there!
Nice fish.  What type of jigs were you using?
nice fish man!  The last few days have been beautiful!  Perfect steelheading weather!
NICE GOIN BRO!!!! LOVE THOSE RIVERWOOD JIGS OF MINE!!! ROE AT FIRST LIGHT THEN JIGS PRODUCE THE WHOLE REST OF THE DAY!!!
Roe is for Sissies!!!... Real men use jigs eh Kemper?!!!
nice fish! And as for the ones you missed... you'll get them next time
Way to go Kemper!  Great job out there....not sure if I'm up to the weekend ratrace out there....LOL.
Go ice fishin' for Burbot Cliff!
I WILL NOT be joining the crowds this weekend. Im gonna wait till monday night to go out.
